name: Color Range
description:
Color Range

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare #28 "You Only Get One"

Description

You Only Get (to see) One color (at a time).

Color Range is a platformer where every level has several different colored elements, but you can only have one colored set of elements visible at a time.

The idea comes from noddy2006 and Managore on Reddit, thanks to them!

Controls
  • A and D to move (QD for qwerty keyboards)
  • Space to jump
  • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 to switch color (mouse wheel and clicking on the HUD works too)
  • N to jump to the next level if you need to
  • R to restart a level
